scripts.package: clear && rm -r dist; rm -r node_modules; rm -r lib/account/
scripts.setup: clear && npm install && tsc && echo 'setup config.'
scripts.finish: clear && echo 'WARNING: Will delete src after!! 5 seconds to respond...' && sleep 5 && rm -r dist; tsc && rm -r src; rm -r tsconfig.json; echo 'finished.'
